articles.author: Chris Mannix
articles.title: What the Thunder Need to Fix in Game 2 of the NBA Finals - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Oklahoma City must capitalize on the turnovers it forces and clean up the paint in order to avoid falling into a 2–0 hole to Indiana.
articles.content: OKLAHOMA CITY About an hour after the final buzzer sounded in the Pacers 111110 Game 1 win in the NBA Finals, Thunder players made the winding walk to the postgame interview room to try to explain wh… [+4953 chars]
